title: Windows local dev: install conda in user-specific directory to avoid conflict
body_html: Currently when developing on the shared Windows debug machine, it's very easy to accidentally wipe out someone else's working binary because the conda environment is shared. This PR fixes that by always installing conda in the user's directory instead.
body_text: Currently when developing on the shared Windows debug machine, it's very easy to accidentally wipe out someone else's working binary because the conda environment is shared. This PR fixes that by always installing conda in the user's directory instead.
